Package wekabci.server.protocol

Interface Summary
Message This interface declare the minimum methods that every message must be able to execute.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMessage Abstract class for all the valid messages in the Protocol.
Bye This message closes the connection to the client.
Classifier This message loads a particular classifier for the thread communication, then gets into a new state to start classifying signals.
Halt This message shuts down the WekaServer.
Hello This is the basic hand shaking message, expected to move from a new connection to a ready to process messages connection.
Ping Simple message just to check if the communication with the server is all right.
Protocol This class implements the protocol of the server.
Save This message indicates the thread to save all the data coming from the client into a file.
Show This message return a list of the available classifiers on the server.
Signal The most important message, used to receive a brain signal from the BCI program, it is classified and then predicted class is returned.
Stop The Stop message stops the thread from classifying signals and returns to the ready state, this is useful if a new classifier wants to be loaded for this thread.
 

Enum Summary
Protocol.States States for the protocol
